Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Class MainGuiController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.MainGuiController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController
public class MainGuiController
extends java.lang.Object
implements GUIController
MainGuiController class handles mainScene.fxml by executing commands from the GUI.
See Also:
GUIController

      public void build​(int row, int col, boolean dome, Action action)
      Method build chooses if to build a block or a dome.
      Parameters:
      row - of type int - the row of the cell.
      col - of type int - the column of the cell.
      dome - of type boolean - true if user wants to build a dome, false otherwise.
      action - of type Action - the type of action.

    • addBlock

      public void addBlock​(int row, int col, int level)
      Method addBlock adds an inner rectangle into the others one, if worker is on the selected cell is brought to the front.
      Parameters:
      row - of type int - the row.
      col - of type int - the column.
      level - of type int - the level of the block

    • move

      public void move​(int oldRow, int oldCol, int newRow, int newCol)
      Method move moves the triangle (worker) into another cell of the gridPane and deletes the precedent one.
      Parameters:
      oldRow - of type int - the worker's old row.
      oldCol - of type int - the worker's old column.
      newRow - of type int - the worker's new row.
      newCol - of type int - the worker's new column.

    • apolloDoubleMove

      public void apolloDoubleMove​(int oldRow1, int oldCol1, int oldRow2, int oldCol2)
      Method apolloDoubleMove moves the two workers into gridPane's cell (switching their fill).
      Parameters:
      oldRow1 - of type int - Apollo's old row (other worker's new row).
      oldCol1 - of type int - Apollo's old column (other worker's new column).
      oldRow2 - of type int - the other worker's old row (Apollo's new row).
      oldCol2 - of type int - the other worker's old column (Apollo's new column).

    • minotaurDoubleMove

      public void minotaurDoubleMove​(int oldRow1, int oldCol1, int oldRow2, int oldCol2, int newRow2, int newCol2)
      Method minotaurDoubleMove moves the two workers into gridPane's cells.
      Parameters:
      oldRow1 - of type int - Minotaur's old row (other worker's new row).
      oldCol1 - of type int - Minotaur's old column (other worker's new column).
      oldRow2 - of type int - the other worker's old row (Minotaur's new row).
      oldCol2 - of type int - the other worker's old column (Minotaur's new column).
      newRow2 - of type int - the other worker's new row.
      newCol2 - of type int - the other worker's new column.

    • highlightCell

      public void highlightCell​(boolean build)
      Method highlightCell highlights some cell of the grid in order to show to the user in which spaces he can move or build onto.
      Parameters:
      build - of type boolean true if highlighting a selectBuild, false if highlighting a selectMove.
